name: Run Off the World
description:
Its the End of The World ! And you got to run away from some of the natural disasters roaming the street so you can reach the End of The World !

There's gonna be Tsunamis, Hurricanes, Erupting Volcanoes and Swarms of Insects ready and ongoing to get you!

Made for the Totally Ranked Jam , with the theme End of the World

Ps 1 - No, I could not implement jumping, it says on the Title ,"Run" , not "Jump"

Ps 2 - Bread Gang
